product_name: AG CareMousse Gel Extra-Firm Curl Retention
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackGet high shine, extra firm curl retention and definition with AG Care Mousse Gel Extra-Firm Curl Retention, a lightweight mousse that is infused with their exclusive Curl Creating Complex containing rice amino acids and bio-fermented tomato extract.
details: DetailsBenefitsDefines curlsFirm holdSoft touchable feelLightweight formulaKey IngredientsRice amino acidsBio-fermented tomato extractFormulated WithoutDrying sulfatesGlutenDEAPABAParabensDMDMHItem 2614590How To UseShake can, dispense into hands and work through clean, damp hair. Diffuse or air dry.IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), Isobutane, Vp/Va Copolymer, Propane, Propylene Glycol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Peg-6 Cocamide, Butane, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Glycerin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Panthenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Rice Amino Acids, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Leaf Extract, Melissa Officinalis Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Sorbic Acid, Benzoic Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake can, dispense into hands and work through clean, damp hair. Diffuse or air dry.

reviews.headline: Not a Strong Hold
reviews.comments: I was so disappointed in this mousse.  It has a nice texture and smells quite nice, but it does NOT have a strong hold at all.  I don't get a gel-like hold at all from this product.  In fact, some of my curls start to frizz just an hour or two after applying.  The curl cream in this brand works MUCH better and gives me a cast similar to a gel product.

reviews.headline: Love This Stuff!
reviews.comments:
Oh my, I am not understanding the negative reviews. I LOVE this stuff! I have never had my curls , not waves  so defined on my 2B/2C hair. I have lots of hair, but it is very fine and very heavy, so heavy the curls normally fall into waves after a few hours. I have a chin length, layered bob style. This product keeps my hair in loose curls despite the weight.

I use a softball size application of AG Care Mousse Extra-Firm along with my other products and diffuse with heat for 15 minutes. I air dry the remainder of the time needed to have the curls stay until I wash next. I do not want to be without this product so much so that I have 2 cans in reserve. Very happy with this product. One of the few products that live up to the claims of retaining curls.

reviews.headline: Smells like rotted tomatoes!
reviews.comments: I was looking for something for my fine curly hair and his had good reviews. The consistency is like a combination of gel and mousse which I thought was great. I wasn't crazy about the smell but thought maybe it would go away after the product dried. It didn't. I literally couldn't stand the way my hair smelled all day! I returned the unused product to Ulta.

reviews.headline: good idea needs better executions
reviews.comments: 4b hair- this can work well as a refresher fro a few straggling curls but doesnt have enough hold/ definitions for a wash and go, works amazing for my friend with type 3 hair

reviews.headline: Not impressed
reviews.comments: Of course, I was influenced to purchase. However, after giving the product relentless tries I was not impressed. My hair felt dry even when adding a leave in conditioner prior to using the mousse gel. The product also does not hold well in humid climates.

reviews.headline: Not impressed
reviews.comments: Of course, I was influenced to purchase. However, after giving the product relentless tries I was not impressed. My hair felt dry even when adding a leave in conditioner prior to using the mousse gel. The product also does not hold well in humid climates.

reviews.headline: Terrible overall
reviews.comments: Made my hair look like trash; no hold or definition, hair felt like straw. Plus, it irritated my scalp and the skin on my neck and shoulders, so I had to return it after 3 days. Medium shine and volume.

reviews.headline: Happy I bought
reviews.comments: My hair is thin and doesn't naturally curl pretty no matter what I use. This product is one of the best I have tried. Will definitely be getting more!

reviews.headline: Love my curls!
reviews.comments: I have been using this mousse for about 10 years. It is hands down the best mousse product I've ever used.  Ulta stopped selling it for awhile and I started buying it at beauty brands or straight from AG.  It leaves my curls moisturized and not at all frizzy. I've told all my friends with curly hair how fabulous this stuff is and now they use it. I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: This product did not work for me. The hold just didn't work.
reviews.comments: I wouldn't recommend this.

reviews.headline: This product did nothing for my curls. Made it really dry.
reviews.comments: It made my hair really dry and hard. Didn't really curl my hair. Hope I can get a refund.

reviews.headline: Idk
reviews.comments: It didnt hold my curls for very long and I actually feel like it dried my hair out. Maybe it's all the alcohol in it?

reviews.headline: Not for coarse curly hair
reviews.comments: I have tried this product many many times in many  different ways. Doesn't provide any hold on my coarse hair.

reviews.headline: Love for Fine curly hair
reviews.comments:
I recent was inteoduced to tbia product when i went to get a haircut at Ulta. They used this product and i had to purchase it. It smells amazing not to strong. I really like the hold it leaves. No extreme crunch it does leave a cast that is easy to scrunch out to leave my curls feeling soft and bouncy. Love that it is lightweight specifically for my fine 2C/3A curly hair and it left a beautiful shine to my dark brown hair. I'm so glad i found a mousse that doesnt have my curls feeling like im back in 2001 with string stiff curls. 

Highly recommend this mousse

reviews.headline: Stifffff
reviews.comments: I thought that this would be the mousse that would give me the most definition but I was completely wrong! The mousse was not foaming at all so it was difficult to try to work into my hair. The consistency was too thick for my type 4 curls:(

reviews.headline: Worst product I've ever used
reviews.comments: I don't know what I did wrong but this product made my hair frizz up like I've never seen before. It is definitely going back.

reviews.headline: LOve it
reviews.comments: I love that this mousse doesn't leave any flakes. I wash my hair every 5 days (curly hair) and there's no build up and it lasts me a good amount of months.

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: I have 2c-3a curls and I use this after styling with a different gel. My curls hold nicely for days. It's very easy to scrunch out any crunch and fluff for great volume and hold.

reviews.headline: Lots of hold without the crunch
reviews.comments:
This mousse gives my fine color treated hair lots of volume and control without the crunch of traditional styling mousse. Great lightweight hold.
I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Too much gel
reviews.comments: I have wavy hair and wanted a profuct that was lighter than gel but could provide defintion. I found this to be too heavy

faceoff_positive.comments:
Oh my, I am not understanding the negative reviews. I LOVE this stuff! I have never had my curls , not waves  so defined on my 2B/2C hair. I have lots of hair, but it is very fine and very heavy, so heavy the curls normally fall into waves after a few hours. I have a chin length, layered bob style. This product keeps my hair in loose curls despite the weight.

I use a softball size application of AG Care Mousse Extra-Firm along with my other products and diffuse with heat for 15 minutes. I air dry the remainder of the time needed to have the curls stay until I wash next. I do not want to be without this product so much so that I have 2 cans in reserve. Very happy with this product. faceoff_positive.headline: Love This Stuff!

faceoff_negative.comments: I like this product and enjoyed using it, but I cannot finish my current bottle because the product stop coming out. I tried shaking it hard, holding it upside down, everything i could think ok but couldn't continue using it.  Im not sure if I got a defective bottle or if all of them are like that. I was in the muddle of doing my hair when this happened and had to use the honey Doux mousse to finish the last section. Unintentionally I discovered a great mix which made my hair last a whole week defined.  In turn, I am debating buying another one because the definition is great but they are pricey to leave a good amount of product go to waste.
faceoff_negative.headline: I like this product butâ€¦
